name: American City Sniper
description:
Mafia gangsters and deadly criminals are destroying peace of the city by killing innocent people on the order of super villains and weed dealers. You as an american superhero has been assigned a task to bring back the world peace and kill the global terrorist who have been under command of dark hero living in forbidden city.

Features:
• Thrilling sniper shooting missions
• Target the running enemies as escape sniper super hero!
• Thrilling Action Packed FPS Game of 2017!
• Master the elite sniper shooter skills!
• Superb 3d Graphics, Animations & Sound Effects!
